item.title: Come Talk To Us On Zybez Ventrilo
item.description: Come join us on Zybez Ventrilo for some RuneScape-related voice-chat. | Rules | Microphone Help

item.title: Penguin Locations for Feb 2- 9
item.description:
Canada_Grrl has penguin locations for you to help you with the Penguin Hide and Seek activity. Hop onto world 60 and join the world60pengs clan chat. If that's full, try W60_penguins, W60pengs, or W60pengu.

1. Dorgesh-Kaan - Barrel - 1 point

2. Keldagrim - Rock - 2 points

3. Relleka - Rock - 1 point
Reach Rellekka by teleporting to Seers' Village and running north or fairy ring code DJR.

4. Lighthouse - Rock - 1 point
It doesn't enter the Lighthouse but roams around it.

5. Neitiznot - Bush - 2 points
Take a boat from Rellekka.

6. Observatory - Crate - 1 point
Often in west Ardougne castle.

7. Gnome Maze - Bush - 1 point
South of Ardougne and often in Port Khazard.

8. Feldip Hills - Bush - 2 points
Anywhere from Oo'glog to Yanille. Often in Yanille south wall.

9. Lletya - Toadstool - 2 points
Requires the Regicide quest to reach Lletya. It roams up to the tree gates. Teleport here using your Elf crystal, charter a boat, or walk using one of the passes.

10. Wilderness - Rock - 2 points

11. Polar Bear - Relleka well - 1 point
Reach Rellekka by teleporting to Seers' Village and running north or fairy ring code DJR.
Requires Hunt for Red Raktuber, The quest. The polar bear is always in a well.

11. Polar Bear - Relleka well - 1 point
Reach Rellekka by teleporting to Seers' Village and running north or fairy ring code DJR.
Requires Hunt for Red Raktuber, The quest. The polar bear is always in a well.

Penguin Hide and Seek

item.title: Wilderness returns
item.description:
Trade limits are gone, allowing trades of any amount.


Players try out the new update just north of GE.


When you die, your items drop onto the ground for the killer to take.

Discuss | Promised changes

item.title: Wilderness Tips Video
item.description:
Jagex put this video together using contributions by players. Of course, if you're a PKer, you wouldn't need tips to tell you what to do... it should all be pure instinct by now. This video is more of a newbie's guide to the Wilderness, and a laugh for the rest of us.

Discuss

item.title: Dungeoneering is our most popular skill guide
item.description:
Read our skill guides even if you don't need to. You're bound to learn something new that can help you save time, save money, and gain XP easier and faster. After Dungeoneering, our most popular skill guides are Summoning, Slayer, and Farming.

Dungeoneering
